 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתַל‎</span>] **verb** ==twist== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el and derivatives; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּתַל‎</span>, chiefly derivatives, in figure senses; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִפְּתַּלְתִּי עִם‎</span> [[Gen.30.8|Gen 30:8]] ***I have wrestled*** (literally twisted myself) ***with; Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצַת נִפְתָּלִים‎</span> [[Job.5.13|Job 5:13]] ***the plan of the tortuous***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִפְתָּל וְעִקֵּשׁ‎</span> [[Prov.8.8|Prov 8:8]] anything ***tortuous and twisted***. **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִםֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִקֵּשׁ תִּתְפַּתָּ֑ל‎</span> [[Ps.18.27|Ps 18:27]] ***with the twisted thou dost deal tortuously***= [[2Sam.22.27|2Sam 22:27]] (so read for impossible <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתַּפָּ֑ל‎</span>).
